capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen Hagrid's beard grow over the years. It's quite impressive, really. He's always been a bit of a gentle giant, and that beard just adds to his rugged charm. I'm certain he takes good care of it too - it's not like he'd let it get out of control!
I've seen Hagrid's beard grow over the years, and I have to say, it's quite impressive. He looks full-of-beards, doesn't he? (laughs)
